detail: Document-oriented(JSON) database and NoSQL. Most of my personal projects are built by MongoDB.
Learned from how to design database to how to use it from the college. I got "A+". Also, I have basic knowledge of MySQL.
Designed for coordinating work among programmers, but it can be used to track changes in any set of files. Used it for all of my personal projects.
Learned basic commands from the college. I also use it in 'macOS Terminal'/'Windows Command Prompt' for NPM, Git and manage folder and file.
This is my first programing language to understand data type, function and class. I've done a 600 pages book about C to understand 'pointer'.

I was a senior computer service technician. I also learned how the networking system works from the college. I'm running a NAS(Network-attached storage) at home for 7 years, so I'm pretty knowledgeable in these.
